buyers.name: KKR India
buyers.investmentThesis: Large-scale buyouts and growth investments in technology, healthcare, and consumer sectors. Focus on companies with strong unit economics, scalable models, and leaders in their niches across India.

buyers.name: Warburg Pincus India
buyers.investmentThesis: Growth-stage and buyout investments in digitally-driven businesses. Strong conviction in India's fintech, healthtech, and consumer digitization themes. Seeks businesses with structural tailwinds.

buyers.name: Blackstone India
buyers.investmentThesis: Large-scale investments in real estate, infrastructure, and technology. Dominant player in Indian real estate PE. Seeks stable cash flows and asset-heavy businesses with growth optionality.

buyers.name: Carlyle India
buyers.investmentThesis: Mid-to-large buyouts in healthcare, IT services, and business services. Focus on operational improvements, margin expansion, and market consolidation plays.

buyers.name: ChrysCapital
buyers.investmentThesis: India's pioneering PE firm. Deep expertise in financial services, business services, and consumer companies. Proven track record of value creation through operational and strategic improvements.

buyers.name: Baring Private Equity Asia
buyers.investmentThesis: Growth equity and buyout investments in technology-enabled businesses. Focus on sector leaders with strong margins and scalable platforms across tech, consumer, and healthcare.

buyers.name: General Atlantic India
buyers.investmentThesis: Growth equity investments in India's digital economy. Pioneer in backing India's largest technology and fintech platforms. Seeks proven business models at inflection points seeking scale capital.

buyers.name: TPG Growth India
buyers.investmentThesis: Growth investments in healthcare, clean energy, and technology. Impact-oriented approach with focus on businesses that create value for Indian consumers while delivering strong returns.

buyers.name: Advent International India
buyers.investmentThesis: Global PE firm with India focus on technology services, business process outsourcing, and healthcare. Seeks market-leading businesses with clear paths to scale and margin expansion.

buyers.name: Apax Partners India
buyers.investmentThesis: Mid-to-large buyouts in technology, business services, and healthcare. Focus on category leaders with recurring revenue models, strong margins, and secular growth drivers.

buyers.name: Kedaara Capital
buyers.investmentThesis: Mid-market buyouts and growth investments in healthcare services, business process companies, and consumer brands. Targets niche market leaders seeking operational improvements.

buyers.name: Multiples Private Equity
buyers.investmentThesis: Consumer-facing and business services businesses with strong brand equity and loyal customer bases. Focuses on consolidation plays in fragmented markets with potential for platform-building.

buyers.name: Gaja Capital
buyers.investmentThesis: Mid-market businesses with proven cash flows and clear paths to scale. Targets companies in business services, healthcare, and consumer sectors that are ready for institutional-grade governance.

buyers.name: True North Partners
buyers.investmentThesis: Mid-market buyouts focused on operational turnaround and platform-building. Seeks businesses with structural advantages but operational inefficiencies that can be addressed through hands-on management.

buyers.name: Everstone Capital
buyers.investmentThesis: Mid-to-large investments in consumer, financial services, and manufacturing. Focus on digitally-enabled businesses with strong distribution and brand moats. Active in creating platforms through consolidation.

buyers.name: Saratoga Investment Advisors
buyers.investmentThesis: Consumer and healthcare businesses with strong brand recognition and recurring revenue. Focuses on category leaders in fragmented markets with room for consolidation and operational improvement.

buyers.name: Leapfrog Investments
buyers.investmentThesis: Impact-driven investments in financial inclusion, insurtech, and healthtech. Targets businesses serving India's underbanked and underinsured populations with scalable, profitable models.

buyers.name: Ascend Capital
buyers.investmentThesis: Growth-stage digital-native businesses in consumer tech, SaaS, and D2C brands. Backs founders building category-defining platforms with strong unit economics and defensible moats.

buyers.name: Catamaran Ventures
buyers.investmentThesis: Technology-driven businesses across India's digital economy. Narayana Murthy's family investment vehicle. Long-term capital with deep understanding of India's tech sector evolution.

buyers.name: India Capital Growth Fund
buyers.investmentThesis: Growth capital for mid-market Indian companies across consumer, financials, and healthcare. Focuses on businesses transitioning from promoter-run to institutionally-managed with IPO potential.

buyers.name: ICICI Venture
buyers.investmentThesis: India's largest domestic institutional PE fund. Broad mandate across technology, consumer, financials, and healthcare. Leverages ICICI Bank's ecosystem and distribution for portfolio companies.

buyers.name: Peak XV Partners
buyers.investmentThesis: India's premier growth equity fund (formerly Sequoia India). Backs category-defining companies across SaaS, fintech, consumer, and healthtech. Seeks founders building generational businesses with scalable unit economics.

buyers.name: Accel India
buyers.investmentThesis: Early-to-growth stage investments in technology-first businesses. Pioneer in Indian startup investing with deep conviction in SaaS, consumer tech, and fintech platforms building for India's 1.4B population.

buyers.name: Bessemer Venture Partners India
buyers.investmentThesis: Growth investments in India's largest consumer and enterprise tech platforms. Focus on marketplaces, SaaS, and consumer brands with network effects and sticky customer relationships.

buyers.name: Tiger Global India
buyers.investmentThesis: Late-stage growth capital for India's fastest-growing technology platforms. High-conviction bets on category winners with massive TAM. Known for large check sizes enabling scale.

buyers.name: Insight Partners India
buyers.investmentThesis: Software and SaaS-focused growth investor. Deep expertise in scaling B2B platforms. Brings operational playbook for SaaS businesses from Series C through to IPO and beyond.

buyers.name: Coatue Management India
buyers.investmentThesis: Technology-driven late-stage growth investments across India's digital economy. High-conviction investor in technology companies with clear paths to scale and profitability.

buyers.name: Prosus Ventures India
buyers.investmentThesis: Strategic growth investments in consumer internet, fintech, and edtech. Prosus (Naspers) brings unique ability to drive operational synergies through global portfolio and distribution capabilities.

buyers.name: Elevation Capital
buyers.investmentThesis: Early-to-growth stage fintech, consumer, and enterprise software. Formerly SAIF Partners, one of India's oldest VC firms. Deep understanding of India's market dynamics and regulatory landscape.

buyers.name: Lightspeed India
buyers.investmentThesis: Technology-native businesses with global expansion potential. Specializes in backing Indian founders building products with cross-border appeal and enterprise-grade solutions.

buyers.name: SoftBank Investment Advisors India
buyers.investmentThesis: Mega-round investments in India's largest technology platforms. Vision Fund deploys capital into companies building digital infrastructure for India. Enables growth through massive capital and global tech vision.

buyers.name: DST Global India
buyers.investmentThesis: Late-stage consumer internet and fintech investments. Known for backing proven platforms at scale. Brings global perspective from investments in leading internet companies worldwide.

buyers.name: Ribbit Capital India
buyers.investmentThesis: Pure-play fintech investor focused on India's financial services disruption. Specializes in payments, lending, insurance, and wealth management platforms rebuilding India's financial stack.

buyers.name: Hummingbird Ventures
buyers.investmentThesis: India-focused growth investor across technology, fintech, and consumer sectors. Backs strong founding teams with product-market fit building scalable businesses targeting India-specific opportunities.

buyers.name: Premji Invest
buyers.investmentThesis: India's largest family office. Patient, long-term capital with impact orientation. Invests across technology, consumer, and healthcare. Azim Premji's vehicle seeks businesses creating lasting value for India.

buyers.name: Ranjan Pai Family Office
buyers.investmentThesis: Manipal Group founder's investment vehicle. Strong in healthcare services and education. Targets businesses with scalable models in healthcare, consumer, and financial services.

buyers.name: Piramal Family Office
buyers.investmentThesis: Ajay Piramal's investment vehicle. Deep expertise in pharma, healthcare, and real estate finance. Patient capital with strategic vision for businesses building India's infrastructure.

buyers.name: Godrej Family Office
buyers.investmentThesis: Godrej Group's investment arm with focus on consumer brands, D2C, and sustainable businesses. Leverages India's leading consumer conglomerate expertise to back next-generation brands.

buyers.name: CK Birla Family Office
buyers.investmentThesis: CK Birla Group's investment arm. Diversified across manufacturing, auto components, and consumer. Seeks businesses with strong brand, operational excellence, and manufacturing moats.

buyers.name: Patni Family Office
buyers.investmentThesis: Technology services focused family office. Background in IT outsourcing and business process management. Targets tech-enabled service businesses with recurring revenue and scalable delivery models.

buyers.name: Dilip Shanghvi Family Office
buyers.investmentThesis: Sun Pharma founder's investment vehicle. Deep expertise in pharmaceutical manufacturing and global drug development. Targets pharma and healthcare companies with strong IP and manufacturing capabilities.

buyers.name: Nandan Nilekani Family Office
buyers.investmentThesis: Infosys co-founder's personal investment vehicle. Focus on digital infrastructure, fintech, and public-interest technology. Seeks founders building India's technology stack for the next generation.

buyers.name: Reliance Industries
buyers.investmentThesis: India's largest conglomerate. Aggressively building digital, retail, and clean energy ecosystems. Seeks businesses that can be integrated into Jio or Reliance Retail platforms for massive distribution synergies.

buyers.name: Tata Capital
buyers.investmentThesis: Tata Group's investment arm. Patient capital with strong brand synergy potential across Tata's consumer, digital, and services portfolio. Targets businesses aligned with Tata's long-term vision for India.

buyers.name: Mahindra Group
buyers.investmentThesis: Diversified conglomerate building India's future mobility, agritech, and digital services. Seeks businesses with clear synergy potential in electric vehicles, farm technology, and digitally-connected services.

buyers.name: Adani Enterprises
buyers.investmentThesis: India's largest infrastructure and energy conglomerate. Aggressively building in renewable energy, airports, ports, and digital infrastructure. Seeks asset-heavy businesses with long-term contractual revenue.

buyers.name: Bajaj Group
buyers.investmentThesis: Financial services and mobility conglomerate. Seeks fintech and insurance businesses that enhance Bajaj Finance and Bajaj Insurance distribution. Strong digital lending and insurance tech thesis.

buyers.name: Aditya Birla Group
buyers.investmentThesis: Diversified conglomerate with India's largest AMC and insurance businesses. Seeks acquisitions in financial services, digital, and manufacturing that leverage ABG's massive distribution and brand.

buyers.name: Vedanta Group
buyers.investmentThesis: Natural resources and energy conglomerate transitioning to clean energy and digital infrastructure. Seeks businesses in renewable energy, data centers, and technology services that complement the Vedanta ecosystem.

buyers.name: Wipro Limited
buyers.investmentThesis: IT services giant acquiring technology capabilities, IP, and talent. Seeks SaaS businesses, specialized tech companies, and digital services firms that enhance Wipro's service delivery and product portfolio.

buyers.name: Infosys Limited
buyers.investmentThesis: India's digital services leader acquiring cloud, AI, and specialized tech capabilities. Seeks companies with domain expertise in banking, retail, and healthcare that accelerate Infosys's digital transformation offerings.

buyers.name: HCL Technologies
buyers.investmentThesis: Aggressive acquirer of technology products and digital services. Known for acquiring enterprise software companies and building them into platforms. Seeks product businesses with recurring revenue and strong IP.

buyers.name: Tech Mahindra
buyers.investmentThesis: Digital and telecom services company seeking acquisitions in 5G, IoT, and digital transformation. Targets tech companies that strengthen Mahindra Group's digital capabilities and customer delivery.

buyers.name: Zomato (Eternal Ltd)
buyers.investmentThesis: India's largest food and quick commerce platform acquiring adjacent categories. Seeks logistics, payment, and consumer businesses that extend Eternal's super-app strategy across India.

buyers.name: PhonePe
buyers.investmentThesis: India's largest UPI payments platform building India's super financial app. Seeks fintech businesses in insurance, lending, and wealth management to integrate into PhonePe's 500M+ user base.

buyers.name: Flipkart (Walmart India)
buyers.investmentThesis: India's largest e-commerce platform (Walmart-backed) building a commerce super-app. Seeks logistics, fintech, and consumer businesses to strengthen India's dominant e-commerce ecosystem.

buyers.name: Paytm (One97 Communications)
buyers.investmentThesis: India's pioneering fintech platform seeking adjacent acquisitions. Focus on lending, insurance distribution, and consumer services that leverage Paytm's massive user base and payment infrastructure.

buyers.name: Motilal Oswal Private Equity
buyers.investmentThesis: India-focused PE with deep capital markets expertise. Motilal Oswal's PE arm targets mid-market businesses with strong brands and growth potential, leveraging the firm's research and market relationships.

buyers.name: JM Financial Investment Advisors
buyers.investmentThesis: Financial services and real estate focused PE. JM Financial's investment arm leverages deep relationships in Indian capital markets to identify and back high-growth mid-market businesses.

buyers.name: Minda Capital
buyers.investmentThesis: Minda Group's investment arm focused on auto components, infrastructure, and EV mobility. Targets businesses with manufacturing excellence and synergy potential with Minda's auto ecosystem.

buyers.name: ResponsAbility Investments
buyers.investmentThesis: Impact-driven Swiss investor active in India. Targets financial inclusion, clean energy, and agricultural businesses that deliver both strong returns and measurable social impact.

buyers.name: ABID Capital
buyers.investmentThesis: Early-growth stage India-focused investor. Backs Indian founders in technology, fintech, and consumer tech at Series A-B with follow-on capital to support scale. Hands-on operational support.
